root.message: The QUALITY_ASSMNT field for indicator 4-1-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: Accurate data on the structure of the national education system and on educational attainment by single year of age are needed for calculating this indicator. Criteria for quality assessment include: data sources must include proper documentation; data values must be representative at the national population level and, if not, should be footnoted; data values are based on a sufficiently large sample; data are plausible and based on trends and consistency with previously published/reported values for the indicator.
